Plot: A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.
Title: Seven Psychopaths
Actors: Michael Pitt, Michael Stuhlbarg, Sam Rockwell, Colin Farrell
tomatoConsensus: Seven Psychopaths delivers sly cinematic commentary while serving up a heaping helping of sharp dialogue and gleeful violence.
